channel.title: R on Shijia's 304 Website
channel.description: Recent content in R on Shijia's 304 Website

item.title: 2019 CES Anaysis
item.description: Abstract My paper is based on some findings of the 2019 Canadian Election Survey’s data. Two variables ‘income’ and ‘religion’ are picked to do some detailed analysis and graphing. The result can be used to estimate some characteristics for the whole population. Some limitations and weaknesses are also existed and listed in the end. Introduction In this paper, we use 2019 Canadian Election Survey as our dataset. The dataset records 37882 observations with 22 variables which display various information of each tested person.
